text: hmm…i couldn’t reproduce this when testing using a template. what kind of asset were you testing with and how were you observing that the draft was not being overwritten when making an update to the published version via `hscms watch`. one thing to keep in mind is that to see the change does require reloading the design manager, which is not ideal but expected right now.
it was a module that wasn't being updated. for confirmation, I did manually reload, no dice.
with module local development, is is best practice to remove the 36 character ids?
I leave them if I fetched, leave them blank if I created them locally first
